attributes.action: Allow people to become a special constable with a criminal record
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our police need more special constables yet we dont have many people applying because all forces reject applications from people with convictions,It is my intention now to put across that only people with serious convictions ie murder,rape,drugs,child abuse etc should be excluded from joining,Afterall people do change and would like to put something back into there community,I would like to ask that all forces allow people with convictions to join as special constables and at least give these people a chance to show the community that they are decent people,Afterall everybody deserves a chance dont they?
